mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_URL, MENU_LV, PARENT_MENU_ID,TREE_MENU ,(SELECT COUNT(B.MENU_LV) FROM TB_MENU B WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.PARENT_MENU_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y') AS LV_CNT FROM TB_MENU A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND MENU_LV = '1' ORDER BY TREE_ORDER ASC
SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_URL, MENU_LV, PARENT_MENU_ID,TREE_MENU FROM TB_MENU WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND MENU_LV = '2' ORDER BY TREE_ORDER ASC
